message.content:
∀ (p : ℕ → ℝ) (n : ℕ),
  (∀ c d, c ∈ Finset.range n → d ∈ Finset.range n → (c + d).sqrt ∈ Finset.range n → p n = 1 / n^2) →
  Filter.tendsto (fun n => p n * n.sqrt) Filter.atTop (Filter.tendsto_const_nhds 0)
∀ (c d : ℕ) (n : ℕ), ProbabilityTheory.Probability (c + d ∈ {k | k ≤ n ∧ ∃ m, m * m = k}) = (∑ k in Finset.range n, 1 / (n : ℝ))

∀ (c d n : ℕ), 1 ≤ c ∧ c ≤ n → 1 ≤ d ∧ d ≤ n → (∃ m : ℕ, c + d = m ^ 2) → 
  tendsto (fun n => (probability c d n) * n.sqrt) at_top (nhds 0)

∀ (p_n : ℕ → ℝ) (h : ∀ n, p_n n = Probability.isPerfectSquareProbability n),
  Filter.tendsto (fun n => p_n n * Real.sqrt n) Filter.atTop (nhds 1)
∀ {n : ℕ}, Filter.tendsto (fun n => (probability_square_sum n) * (n:ℝ) ^ 0.5) Filter.atTop Filter.atTop
∀ (c d : ℕ), ∃ p_n, (c + d) ∈ SetOf (fun x => Nat.isPerfectSquare x) → Filter.tendsto (fun n => p_n * n.sqrt) Filter.atTop Filter.atTop

∀ (p_n : ℕ → ℝ),
  (∀ n, p_n n = (Nat.sqrt n)⁻¹ * ↑(Finset.card (Finset.filter (fun x => Nat.isSquare (x.fst + x.snd))
    (Finset.product (Finset.range n) (Finset.range n))))) →
    Filter.tendsto (fun n => p_n n * Real.sqrt n) Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ (c d n : ℕ), (c + d ≤ n) → ∃ P, Filter.Tendsto (fun n => P n * n.sqrt) Filter.atTop (nhds (1 : ℝ))

∀ (p_n : ℕ → ℝ) (c d : ℕ), (∀ n, p_n n = ((Finset.range (n + 1)).filter (λ m, ∃ c d, c + d = m ∧ IsSquare m)).card / n ^ 2) → 
  Tendsto (fun n => p_n n * n.sqrt) Filter.atTop (𝓝 (1 / √π))

∀ {c d : ℕ}, 
  let p_n := (∑ c d in Finset.range n, ((c + d).sqrt * (c + d).sqrt = c + d) : ℝ) / (n * n) in 
  Filter.tendsto (λ n, p_n * n.sqrt) Filter.atTop (Filter.tendsto_const_nhds _)
